mapper.select: select r.room_no, r.room_time, r.room_name, a.id from room r join (select u.id, m.room_no from users u join room_mem m on u.id = m.id ) a on r.room_no = a.room_no where a.id = #{id}
SELECT msg_no, room_no, id, content, TO_CHAR(msg_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS msg_time FROM Message WHERE room_No = #{roomNo} ORDER BY msg_Time ASC

WITH latest_room_mem AS ( SELECT id, room_no, mem_time, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY id, room_no ORDER BY mem_time DESC) as rn FROM room_mem ) SELECT a.id, a.room_no, a.msg_no, a.content, a.msg_time, a.room_name FROM ( SELECT m.room_no, m.msg_no, m.content, rm.id, m.msg_time, r.room_name FROM message m JOIN room r ON m.room_no = r.room_no JOIN latest_room_mem rm ON m.room_no = rm.room_no AND m.id = rm.id WHERE rm.rn = 1 ) a WHERE a.msg_time > ( SELECT mem_time FROM latest_room_mem WHERE id = a.id AND room_no = a.room_no AND rn = 1 ) AND a.room_no = #{roomNo}
select i.emp_no, u.id, i.name, i.rank, d.dept_name FROM user_info i, departments d, users u where i.dept_no = d.dept_no AND i.emp_no = u.emp_no AND u.id != #{id}
SELECT r.room_no FROM room r LEFT JOIN room_mem m ON r.room_no = m.room_no GROUP BY r.room_no HAVING COUNT(m.id) = 0
select count(id) as id from room r, room_mem m where r.room_no = m.room_no and r.room_no = #{roomNo}
SELECT SUBSTR(CONTENT, 1, LEAST(10, LENGTH(CONTENT))) AS CONTENT FROM ( SELECT CONTENT FROM MESSAGE WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY MSG_TIME DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
